comments: Professor Brown is the best. I took Spanish II with him in the summer semester and it was the easiest class. He speaks spanish the whole time but don\'t let that discourage you, he does it in a way that if you pay attention you will understand what he is talking about and he is impossible to fail.

comments: Took him as a summer course and really enjoyed his class. He lectures pretty much the whole time in Spanish, but don\'t let that discourage you. He is a really nice man and tries to make the class fun. He is pretty easy going on grading.

comments: Dr. Brown is the easiest professor you will ever have. We used two books the whole semester and they were about 200 pages each. Besides that, all we did was watch movies. The tests were super easy. All you have to do is talk about the characters and you\'ll get an A on the test. We wrote 2 three page essays and had one power point project. Easy A!
